title: S17 Ep89: Supernatural News/Parashare: Strange Glows. AI Souls, & Hittin' all the Holes Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Strange Glows. AI Souls, & Hittin' all the Holes Edition
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: Strange Glows. AI Souls, & Hittin' all the Holes Edition with Beer City Bruiser!! 

It has been a bizarre week world wide and it is bringing out the strange and supernatural, Tim and Bruiser have rolled up their sleeves and got to work gathering the stories for you!

This week,  A House Intelligence Committee Member warns us not to be so quick to share you health data with DNA services like 23andMe, because it can be stolen and turned into a bio-weapon!! An eerie glow in Australia uncovers something more fortuitous. A Chess playing robot in Russia teaches an impatient child a painful lesson, and an Amazon Prime TV Host may have caught ghosts near Mt. Vesuvius on his new TV series!

Check out what a submachine gun carrying robodog looks like: https://www.thedrive.com/the-war-zone/this-submachine-gun-equipped-robot-dog-goes-full-john-wick-at-shooting-range

To learn more about Microdose Gummies go to Microdose.com and use code: darkness to get free shipping & 30% off your first order 

Find out where Beer City Bruiser is holding his breath and needlepointing near you: https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester
